title: old license plate
content:
Hi everyone

I'm just looking for that kind of font, is an old license plate, can you help me to find it??

Thx

Regards

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [licenseplate.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073048/http:/typophile.com/files/licenseplate.jpg) | 2.26 KB |
author: oskrbt1983

comments.content: Having a look to [DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073048/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/din) might be a good start.
Yes, close, but typefaces according to DIN 1451 never had a 3 with a horizontal top stroke.

Have a look here to find the right one: [http://www.leewardpro.com/articles/licplatefonts/licplate-fonts-intro.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073048/http:/www.leewardpro.com/articles/licplatefonts/licplate-fonts-intro.html "http://www.leewardpro.com/articles/licplatefonts/licplate-fonts-intro.html")  
Some I found: [Numberplate LL](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073048/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Headline+Fonts/Numberplate), [Italian Plate](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725073048/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fplaytype.com/font/italian-plate)
